description: Toshiba Canvio Portable Hard DriveSimple Backup, Portability, and Reliable Toshiba Quality. All Rolled Into One.Toshiba’s new Canvio Portable Hard Drives offer portable storage up to 1TB of capacity for your photos, music, videos, and more. Enjoy peace of mind with a comprehensive yet simple-to-use backup software that lets you backup and restore your entire system. Each Canvio Portable Hard Drive includes an internal shock sensor and a stylish, anti-slip design to help keep your drive safe while on the go.Features & Benefits:Simple-to-UseNTI Backup Now EZ SoftwareIncluded On Drive:File & Folder Backup —Finds all movies, pictures, and music to backupSimple Restore —Click the Restore button to recover a file or folderComplete System Backup —Keeps a copy of everything on your computer, including the OSSystem Recovery —Boot to the drive and restore your entire systemData Encryption —Secures your backup with a password with a data encryption up to 256-bitCustomized Backup —Customize your backup preference and scheduleDrive Space Alert —Alerts you when running low on backup spaceWhat's In the BoxToshiba Canvio Portable Hard DrivePreloaded Backup SoftwareUSB 2.0 CableQuick Start GuideThree Year Limited Warranty
title: Toshiba Canvio Plus 320 GB 2.0 Portable External Hard Drive E05A032CAU2XK (Raven Black)
